definition[0]: a substance used to make tyres, boots etc, which is made from the juice of a tropical tree or artificially
definition[1]: a small piece of rubber or similar material used for removing pencil marks from paper
definition[2]: an object used for cleaning marks from a blackboard
definition[4]: a series of games of bridge or cricket
definition[5]: the piece of white rubber where the pitcher (=person who throws the ball) stands in a baseball game
